price: 10. Het maakt hen niet uit of je hen waarschuwt of niet, zij zullen niet geloven.
arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wasawāon ʿalayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum lā yu'minūna
